scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki hypes up the crowd during the opening of her first live concert.
Instrumental transition with dramatic lighting and visual effects as the scene changes.
Fubuki reappears in her 'ANTHEM' costume and addresses the Yokohama audience.
Performance of the 1st live's main theme song, 'ANTHEM'.

subtitles.original: 白上も 歌も
subtitles.english: Let Shirakami and the songs

subtitles.original: 皆さんに届け！
subtitles.english: reach everyone!

subtitles.original: 押して押されてお兄さんもお姉さんも！
subtitles.english: Pushing and pulling, brothers and sisters!

subtitles.original: ここまでよくできました。
subtitles.english: You've done well so far.

subtitles.original: 最後に一つ。
subtitles.english: One last thing.

subtitles.original: 3000回でも足りないぞ。
subtitles.english: 3000 times isn't enough.

subtitles.original: 100万回 愛してる！
subtitles.english: I love you a million times!

subtitles.original: これまでを支えてくれたさ
subtitles.english: You've supported me until now

subtitles.original: 皆さんに寄り添いたいなって
subtitles.english: I want to be close to everyone

subtitles.original: 大切な仲間たちとこれからも
subtitles.english: With precious friends, from now on too

subtitles.original: 今もずっと大好きなこの場所で
subtitles.english: Always and forever in this place I love

subtitles.original: 君も至って押したってWelcome
subtitles.english: You're here, you're pushing, welcome

subtitles.original: ワクワク更新中
subtitles.english: Excitement in progress

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ明日も 未来も
subtitles.english: The tomorrow and future yet unseen

subtitles.original: お友達ですよ！
subtitles.english: We are friends!

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょげたって 大好きじゃい
subtitles.english: Even if you cry or get depressed, I love you

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に ハイ・ファイ・ハイ！
subtitles.english: High-five-high together with a smile!

subtitles.original: 心を歌に重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering our hearts on the song

subtitles.original: 届けましょう ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Let's deliver it! High! High!

subtitles.original: 繋げましょう ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Let's connect! High! High!

subtitles.original: シャイニースマイル！
subtitles.english: Shiny Smile!

subtitles.original: さあ横浜！もっともっと盛り上がっていこうか！
subtitles.english: Now Yokohama! Let's get even more excited!

subtitles.original: みんな手振って声出していけますよね！
subtitles.english: Everyone wave your hands and shout, you can do it, right?!

subtitles.original: 全力でいけますよね！
subtitles.english: You can go all out, right?!

subtitles.original: 声が小さい！いけますよね！
subtitles.english: The voices are small! You can do it, right?!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。最後まで楽しんでいってください。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Please enjoy until the very end.

subtitles.original: 閃光のように...
subtitles.english: Like a flash of light...

subtitles.original: いくぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: 君が見てる私の世界
subtitles.english: The world of mine that you see

subtitles.original: 歪んでいく悪戯の中で
subtitles.english: In the midst of the distorting mischief

subtitles.original: 立ちすくむ私 言葉並べてしまったせいなのか
subtitles.english: I'm frozen, is it because I lined up words?

subtitles.original: 少し笑えた君と共に歩んできた
subtitles.english: I could smile a little, having walked with you

subtitles.original: 夜の果てを思い出し歌う
subtitles.english: Remembering the end of the night and singing

subtitles.original: 言葉にならない感情事すべて今届けたい
subtitles.english: Everything, all the feelings that can't be put into words, I want to deliver now

subtitles.original: 君が愛してくれるから君を愛してるから
subtitles.english: Because you love me, because I love you

subtitles.original: 刹那の今が輝いてゆく
subtitles.english: The fleeting moment of now is shining

subtitles.original: 千の星座を見上げ超新星のスピードで
subtitles.english: Looking up at a thousand constellations at supernova speed

subtitles.original: 閃光のようにいつでも会いにゆく
subtitles.english: Like a flash of light, I'll always go to see you

subtitles.original: 満ちてる私の未来
subtitles.english: My future is filling up

subtitles.original: 積み重ねる引力兼ねて
subtitles.english: Accumulating, combining gravity

subtitles.original: 様式的な現実感が曖昧になってゆく
subtitles.english: The formal sense of reality is becoming ambiguous

subtitles.original: そんな毎日だけどとても大事なことは
subtitles.english: Days like that, but the very important thing

subtitles.original: 自分のことも愛せることだ
subtitles.english: Is being able to love yourself too

subtitles.original: 多少はうまくできない時だってまたやり直そう
subtitles.english: Even when you can't do it well sometimes, let's start over again

subtitles.original: 君が相手じゃなくたって君を愛すから
subtitles.english: Even if you're not the one, I'll love you

subtitles.original: 刹那の今が輝いて
subtitles.english: The fleeting moment of now is shining

subtitles.original: 千の星座を見上げ超希望のスピードで
subtitles.english: Looking up at a thousand constellations at super-hope speed

subtitles.original: 心繋ぐ
subtitles.english: Connecting hearts

subtitles.original: もっともっと声出して！
subtitles.english: Shout more and more!

subtitles.original: まだ足りないぞ！
subtitles.english: Still not enough!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: The best!

subtitles.original: 3000回の言葉じゃ何も伝わらない
subtitles.english: 3000 words convey nothing

subtitles.original: 実はもっと間近で...
subtitles.english: Actually, more close up...
